casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Scott BADGETT. No. 522A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 7, 2006. John H. Watters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of February 2006 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of February 2006."
